entries.journal_entry_description: The Rebel scum have started to bring reinforcements from other parts of the galaxy to Restuss. Strike at them before they can even reach Rori!
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You've been tasked with defeating 40 members of the Rebel Army.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Return to Lieutenant Gregor in Restuss and let him know that your assignment is done.
